channel.title: Portapps
channel.description: Collection of portable apps for Windows

item.title: Android Studio portable 3.4.2-4
item.description:
A new Portapps app has been added to the collection !
Android Studio is the official IDE for Googleâ€™s Android operating system.
You can download this first release of Android Studio 3.4.2-4 on the Android Studio page !
